goal.en: This course introduces the key elementary theorems of probability, including distributions of discrete and continuous random variables, discrete and continuous random vectors, and sums of random variables.
goal.ch: 這門課程將講解機率最重要的基礎理論，包括離散與連續隨機變數的機率分布、離散與連續隨機向量的機率分布、與隨機變數總和之機率分布。
